motto: We create colorful and eye-catching websites

activities.title: Websites & E-commerce
activities.content: We use the newest technology and innovative designs to build personalized websites according to your needs. At very affordable prices, we will work with you to create attractive websites that engage visitors

activities.title: Beautiful Design
activities.content: We tailor the design of your website to your needs and make it look modern and sleek. We will help you to create a logo, branding guidelines, a design for desktop or tablet

activities.title: Analytics
activities.content: Whether you are a doctor, a lawyer, a small or large company, we will help you to learn how users engage with your products, experiences, and campaigns so you can increase traffic and sales

testimonials.title: Hélène C.
testimonials.content: Web toucan has successfully rebuilt our old website. Thanks to the contribution of the new technologies of the web, we now have a platform with a neat design, which corresponds perfectly to our willingness

testimonials.title: Sabine P.
testimonials.content: We asked Web Toucan to redesign our old website so that it can meet higher standards. The mission has been achieved successfully. We now know that we can rely on their skills and competences

company.title: Company info
company.content: We Are a small team of designers, analyst and developers using innovative technics to build websites and help companies to improve digital performance.

team_members.name: Jean-Marc
team_members.content: 4 years experience with backend and frontend technologies (Laravel, VueJS, ReactJS, Node). Certified webmaster from HES-SO Valais and Amazon Cloud Architect.

team_members.name: Ivan
team_members.content: Econometrician with 5 years of experience as an analyst and research. Experience with Google Analytics, E-commerce, and online marketing.

team_members.name: Mary
team_members.content: Graphic designer focused on the development of illustration, packaging design, branding, corporate image and advertising starting from different approaches to get unique designs.
